item.description:
For those who love dancing to GREAT LIVE MUSIC, this band will meet your expectations!! I know these guys (semi) personally; they played in my backyard!! So, definitely have your DANCING SHOES ON!!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Blue F.O.s are a 6 piece rhythm and blues explosion featuring ace harp player James “Killer” Kane. The Blue F.O.s have performed around the world and around the corner. The members of the band are your average blue collar workers who get up every day and grind it out 9 to 5 with every other hard working American.

In April of 2010 they released their first LIVE CD recorded at the famous blues and jazz club "Chan’s," located in historic Woonsocket, RI. That same summer, one of the songs on that CD (a cover of Coco Montoya’s “Back in a Cadillac” ) made it to the number one spot in only 17 weeks on “Cashbox Magazine’s, “Roadhouse Blues and Boogie” charts. They held that position for 3 weeks remaining on the top 40 for a total of 26 weeks.

You can check the band out @ http://www.bluefos.com/

You can check the venue out @ http://corinnesbanquets.com/about.htm

HOPE TO SEE PEOPLE THERE!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the table with the MEET-UP sign!

group.name: South Shore Hike, Bike & Social Club

item.name: Dancing with The Blue FO's at Corrine's, Pawtucket, RI
